imdb.plot outline: Pleasure Island is a family theme park located on the East Coast of England at Cleethorpes. We spend a day with the staff two days before they open to the public and discover a hive of activity. From ride maintenance and testing, to checking the animals in the farm and petting zoo, the staff are working as fast as they can to get the Park ready for opening time.
imdb.title: Access All Areas: Pleasure Island, Cleethorpes
akas: Access All Areas: Pleasure Island, Cleethorpes (United Kingdom)
plot: Behind the scenes at Pleasure Island, Cleethorpes, UK.::James Smart

Pleasure Island is a family theme park located on the East Coast of England at Cleethorpes. We spend a day with the staff two days before they open to the public and discover a hive of activity. From ride maintenance and testing, to checking the animals in the farm and petting zoo, the staff are working as fast as they can to get the Park ready for opening time.::James Smart
